div.p: Greetings. Behold, reverend father, another letter, in which it is written that the council is gradually dissolving.
Today I read another letter, which was written in Bergamo, in which it was announced to them the death of the pope, which I still do not believe.
But it is a sign that he is lying mortally ill.
More certain news about the council shortly.
To the most distinguished man, Mr. Heinrich Bullinger, his lord and reverend father in Christ.
